lead_paragraph: Third-ranked David Nalbandian took a step closer to making the Masters Cup by beating Roko Karanusic, 6-2, 6-4, yesterday at the Swiss Indoors. Nalbandian needs to reach the final this week to secure one of the last four berths in next month’s eight-man Masters Cup in Shanghai. Last year, he upset Roger Federer at the event. The defending champion in the Swiss tournament, Fernando González, also vying for a spot in the Masters Cup, edged Simone Bolelli of Italy, 7-6 (3), 6-7 (2), 7-6 (3).
